rules.description: Auto generated layer conditions
Fn to Left Command
Fn + Left Control to Fn
Left Control to Enter
Right Shift + Left to rewind media
Right Shift + Right to fast forward media
Right Shift + Up to raise volume
Right Shift + Down to lower volume
Left Shift + Up to increase brighness
Left Shift + Down to decrease brightness
Left Command + Left Shift + p to play / pause | skip in Focus-to-do
Tab + r to close all notifications | snooze 1 notification
Make modifier keys work properly on remote desktop
Tweak modifier keys to work smoothly on Window
Caps Lock to Right Command (WIN in Windows)
Make Left Alt act as Left Alt (not Right Alt) when pressing up/down key to be able to map it in VSCode
Left Command + Q: activate Google Chrome Grebban

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome Grebban" to activate'

rules.description: Left Command + 1: activate Google Chrome Personal

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome Personal" to activate'

rules.description: Left Command + 2: activate iTerm + Fork

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'tell application "iTerm" to activate
delay 0.3
tell application "Fork" to activate
tell application "iTerm" to activate'

rules.description: Left Command + e: activate Google Chrome Dev

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome Dev" to activate'

rules.description: Left Command + 3: activate Slack
Left Command + 4: activate Google Chrome YouTube

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome YouTube" to activate'

rules.description: Left Command + o to enter url in address bar
Tab + 1 to duplicate tab
Tab + b to make text bold
Tab + i to make text italic
Tab + u to underline text
Tab + m to highlight text
Tab + c to create code block
Tab + e to hard reload
Right Option + Right Shift + t to open Toggl tab
Right Option + Right Shift + n to open Notion tab
Right Option + Right Shift + j to open Jira tab
Right Option + Right Shift + b to open Bitbucket tab
Right Option + Right Shift + a to open Azure tab
Right Option + Right Shift + c to open calendar tab
Right Option + Right Shift + m to open mail tab
Tab + n to switch to prev developer pane
Tab + . to switch to next developer pane
Left Command + i to toggle inspector
Left Command + m to toggle desktop / mobile
Left Command + c to toggle element inspector
Right Option + Right Shift + d to focus dev tools
Right Option + Right Shift + v to focus viewport
Left Option + Tab to alternate between 2 tabs (need Recent Tabs extension)
Left Command + Left Shift + J to switch javascrtipt on / off
Right Command + F to open Grebban workspace
Right Command + A to open Royal workspace
Right Command + S to open SEO workspace
Left Command + Tab to find channel
Left Command + Caps Lock + x to run last used terminal command
Left Command + x to reload Chrome Dev

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "Google Chrome Dev" to activate
            delay 0.5
            tell application "System Events" to key code 15 using {command down, shift down}
            '

rules.description: Tab + w / e to Switch tab
Left Command + . to console log without variable
Left Command + , to console log with variable
Right Command + s to stage selected area
Right Command + r to revert selected changes
Left Command + 2 to Close all tab if held / Close current tab if tapped
Left Command + Z to terminate process

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "System Events" to key code 6 using control down
            delay 0.5
            tell application "System Events" to key code 6 using control down
            '

rules.description: Right Command + ä to searh for file
Tab + K / J to focus split pane above / below
Tab + H / L to focus tab to the left / right

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 48 using {control down, shift down}
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            '

osascript -e '
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 48 using control down
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            '

osascript -e '
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 89 using {command down, shift down}
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            '

osascript -e '
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 50 using {command down, shift down}
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            '

rules.description: Keypad 7 to 7 in order for it to work as expected, given the Ukelele remap explained above
Left Command + Shift + J / K to move down / up in Fork

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 125
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            '

osascript -e '
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 126
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            '

rules.description: Right Shift + Right Option + I to view branch info in Fork

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 18 using {command down, option down}
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            '

rules.description: Right Shift + Right Option + C to view branch changes in Fork

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 19 using {command down, option down}
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            '

rules.description: Right Shift + Right Option + F to view branch file tree in Fork

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 20 using {command down, option down}
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            '

rules.description: Tab + - to split horizontally
Tab + t to open new tab and split horizontally
Command + 2 to close tab group

to.shell_command:
osascript -e '
            tell application "Fork" to activate
            tell application "System Events" to key code 13 using {command down}
            tell application "iTerm" to activate
            '

rules.description: Left Command + J / K to move down / up
Right Shift + Right Option + I to view branch info
Right Shift + Right Option + C to view branch changes
Right Shift + Right Option + F to view branch file tree
Left Command + O to open file in VSCode
Q + {key} to shift application

to.shell_command:
osascript -e 'tell application "kitty" to activate
tell application "GitKraken" to activate
tell application "kitty" to activate'
osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome Dev" to activate'

rules.description: Press J / K / L / Ö to enter arrow mode
Left Command + Shift + Return: Maximize window
Left Command + Shift + Arrow Up: Maximize window with no space around
Left Command + Shift + Arrow Left: Position window to left half
Left Command + Shift + Arrow Right: Position window to right half
Left Command + Shift + Arrow Down: Position windows
Right Option to Backspace
Left Command + Backspace to Left Option + Backspace
Left Option to Delete
Caps Lock to Left Control + Shift if holding, to a if pressed alone
Caps Lock + Left Option to Shift + Left Control + d
Left Command + Caps Lock to Left Control + Left Option, to alternate between the 2 most recent tabs if pressed alone
Caps Lock + Left Command to Left Control + Left Option
Caps Lock + a to a, r
Esc to Caps Lock
Shift + Left Option to delete row
Left Shift to Left Shift if holdeing, to ä if pressed alone
Right Shift to Right Shift if holding, to - if pressed alone
Left Shift + Right Shift to Ä
Right Shift + Left Shift to _
Tab to Right Control if holding, to q if pressed alone
Right Command to Left Command + Left Option + Left Control, to Spacebar if pressed alone
Left Command + Right Command to Special 1, to Open command palette if pressed alone
Spacebar to Special 3 (WE) if holding, to Tab if pressed alone
Left Command + Spacebar to Special 2, to open spotlight if pressed alone
Left Command to Left Control, to Escape if pressed alone
Spacebar to Left Option if holding, to Tab if pressed alone
Right Command to Spacebar
Tab + Caps Lock to Right Control + Left Shift
Left Command + S to Copy
Left Command + D to Paste
Left Command + A to Cut
Left Command + C to Mark All
Left Command + W to Step Back
Left Command + E to Step Forward
Left Command + F to Find
Q to App Switcher Hotkey, to Q if pressed alone
Left Command + h / j / k / l to arrow keys
Left Command + h / j / k / l + Caps Lock 5x to arrow keys
Left Command + h / j / k / l + Caps Lock + Shift + to 25x Shift + Arrow keys
Left Command + h / j / k / l + Caps Lock + Shift + to 5x Shift + Arrow keys
Left Command + h / j / k / l + Shift to Shift + Arrow keys
Left Command + Q to Save
Left Command +  to App Switching
§ to App Switching
Left Command + § to Switch window within app
Left Command + O to Open
- to Right Option if holding, to . if pressed alone
Left Command + 2 to Close tab
Map T, Y, and B to 1, 2 and 0
Caps Lock to G
Close tab with Tab + w
Left Command + Shift + F: Check if we have synced all repos to GitHub
Long press Left Command + Left Shift +  to switch to colemak dh keyboard mapping
Long press 7 to switch to new qwerty keyboard mapping
Long press 8 to switch to old qwerty keyboard mapping
Fn + ´ to switch to Olof's keyboard mapping
